directions: Stir together the wine, brandy, orange juice concentrate, lemonade concentrate, fruit punch concentrate, and grape juice concentrate in a 5 gallon insulated beverage container or cooler.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
1 (16 ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen fruit punch drink concentrate, thawed
1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen grape juice concentrate, thawed
title: Vinnie's Killer Sangria
